PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03402018-03-26IRCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Work Permits)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (work permits) in order to remove the cumulative duration limit and related provisions from the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations. The initial intent of the limit, namely to prevent growth of long-term temporary foreign workers, is presently being met through other measures.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0061 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
